bullish_factors: IV Rank at 18th percentile - cheap options
March expiry gives 60 DTE for thesis to play out
bearish_factors: Broader market uncertainty ahead of FOMC
decisions.rationale: Buying AAPL Mar 21 2026 $250 calls. Stock at $242, OTM call gives leveraged upside exposure. Max loss is premium paid ($2,550 for 3 contracts). Target exit if AAPL reaches $270 or IV spikes.

plan_rationale: Single-leg call purchase: AAPL bullish thesis with defined risk via options. Low IV environment makes calls attractive. Position sized for max loss of ~2.5% of portfolio.
